context: Re-Root Canal Treatment,Cosmetic/ Aesthetic Dentistry,Dental Implant,
review: Dr. Raju Srinivas is a Highly Experienced Dentist. When I visited, I needed Two implants and two Root canals and several ceramic cappings. After my implants I was on semi-solid diet for 3-4 days but after that I am all good. Dr. Raju's treatment made me realise that no matter the cost, the modern dental treatments are **** ********* *** helpful. I am yet to get my artificial crown on my implants, after which I shall post an updated review about how it went. So far the treatments have been really smooth and I feeling very good about choosing Dr. Raju as my family dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was so skeptical about going to a dentist at this point of time but had to, I had a wisdom tooth growing in the corner most part and since pain was bad, I had to visit Dr. Raju. But I was amazed and very happy the way precautions were taken and the way cleanliness and distancing was maintained, I felt safe and very comfortable. And I must sayhe is definitely one of the most brilliant dentist I have come across. He explained everything in detail and the reason why it so happened. I am very happy and would definitely recommend people to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Raju is a professional. He treats patients with utmost care and gives personal attention to the smallest details and makes the patient feel comfortable and welcome. I feel very very SAFE in his hands. He does everything almost painlessly , which is a very difficult thing to do in a DENTAL procedure.

review: Dr Raju is ********* ******* *** experienced at what he does- and he ensures doing it with perfection. He is also patient and explains why a certain damage happened, how he's going to restore etc- he answered all my questions through the treatment. You're in safe hands if you're treated by him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am Parimala, aged 69 years. Dr. Raju Srinivas has treated me for several dental issues over the years. His expertise in handling the patients and providing complete relief towards the dental issues are commendable. I have also got implants placed by him and I am very comfortable with them now. I appreciate Dr.Raju's carftmenship and I would highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been a  patient of Dr. Raju srinivas for  almost 15 years now. Right from my accident to till now, I have never been comfortable with any other doctor except for Dr. Raju.  Thr kind of knowledge Dr. Raju has abt dentistry , especially crowns n implants is unmatchable. I'm grateful to Dr. Raju and Dr. Aarti.  Cheers!

review: * ***** ******* ** *** ** *** **** ** ****** ********** His attention to detail and precise execution, and ability to fix complex problems is amazing. As I am aged my natural teeth fell off, Dr.Raju placed implants into my mouth, about an year ago, now they are well set, my gums have grown well around the implants and now my face looks so full. Thanks to Dr.Raju's experience in dealing with complex problems. I am happy and smiling now.
